newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish currency reserves down to $17.98 bln March.
newsitem.headline: Polish currency reserves down to $17.98 bln March.

text.p: Polish official foreign currency reserves fell by $298 million in March to $17.977 billion but were $425 million higher than a year ago, the National Bank of Poland said on Tuesday.
Official reserves fell $56 million in the first quarter of 1997 against a $2.59 billion rise in the first quarter of 1996.
POLISH RESERVES (bln dollars) MARCH FEBRUARY MARCH '96
NOTE - Figures in billions of dollars. Official reserves are those held by the state. Net reserves mean the total amount of hard currencies in the whole banking system.
